invalidForgetFormAlert: Please use a valid email address, such as user@example.com.
forgetFormErrorMessage: If the entered email address is associated with this store, you will receive a password reset email.
forgetFormSuccessMessage: If the entered email address is associated with this store, you will receive a password reset email. If you don't receive this e-mail, please check your junk mail folder or contact us for further assistance.
